data.title: Thomas Boulter of Leicester
data.meta_description:
Am researching Thomas Boulter, born 1795 in the Leicester area -- christened in Thrussington.  Sometime before 1823 he emigrated to New Brunswick, Canada, where he married Sarah Davis/Davies, from Wales. He was serving in His Majesty's 74th Regiment in Fredericton at the time of his marriage.   
 
I believe his parents were named George and Frances/Fanny.  (I also think there may have been an earlier son born about 1792, also named Thomas, who died before the one I'm looking for.) 
 
Is anyone
data.text:
Am researching Thomas Boulter, born 1795 in the Leicester area -- christened in Thrussington. Sometime before 1823 he emigrated to New Brunswick, Canada, where he married Sarah Davis/Davies, from Wales. He was serving in His Majesty's 74th Regiment in Fredericton at the time of his marriage.

I believe his parents were named George and Frances/Fanny. (I also think there may have been an earlier son born about 1792, also named Thomas, who died before the one I'm looking for.)

Is anyone doing any research on this family line possibly?

Ann

Hi Ann. I was amazed to find your post. I could have written one exactly like it! I am descended from Thomas's daughter Phoebe, who married Neil MacKinnon in New Brunswick. I just borrowed microfilm from the Canadian Natl Archives with the 74th Regt info on it, and I'm waiting for some land petition/grant documents which I ordered from the Archives in New Brunswick. After seeing the military record, I'm now certain that our Thomas is the Thomas born to George & Frances in Thrussington. Would enjoy exchanging info. This is my first time on this forum. Does it give you my email address? -Gayle

Hi gayle1947

I think that I'm correct that your email addresses are not available to other ordinary members of the forum to protect you from spam and other more malicious forms of hacking. I suggest that you use the PM facility of the forum to contact intaglio privately. Good luck with your searches

cheers

Bob,

Haven't been able to establish any siblings for Thomas yet, and I think there were a number of Boulters in the Leicester/Thrussington area, but maybe at some point a connection between William and Thomas might show up. Thank you for passing along the information.

A.

All records from Holy Trinity church, Thrussington, Leicestershire

George M Baptism Date 03 Oct 1782 - Son of George and Frances Boulter

* M Baptism Date 18 Feb 1784 - Son of George and Frances Boulter

John M Burial Date 25 Feb 1784 - Son of George and Frances Boulter

John M Baptism Date 25 Jan 1785 - Son of George and Frances Boulter

Elizabeth F Baptism Date 04 Feb 1787 - Daughter of George and Frances Boulter

William M Baptism Date 18 Jan 1789 - Son of George and Frances Boulter

Thomas M Baptism Date 11 Mar 1792 - Son of George and Frances Boulter

Thos Infant. Burial Date 20 Jul 1793 Â– No parents names given

Thomas M Baptism Date * Aug 1795 - Son of George and Frances Boulter

"Terrysfamily"

Thank you so much for the records from Holy Trinity! There is the whole family of their children listed, which is SO helpful. I see that Thomas did indeed have a brother named William, although not the William that Bob mentioned.

Thank you again for your valuable assistance. It will help to flesh out this line of our family more thoroughly!

Best,

Ann
